slot.name: hcRuleId
slot.value: CommonFunction_CheckSynchronizationReference

slot.name: description
slot.value: Check for the synchronization reference status

slot.name: name
slot.value: Check synchronization reference

slot.name: recommendedAction
slot.value: Check availabilityStatus and referenceStatus attribute for more details and observe Alarms for failure indication. Resolve the problem that caused the resource being inoperable.

slot.value: Check for the number of active radio links in a cell

slot.name: name

slot.name: hcRuleId
slot.value: SystemFunction_CheckDiskSpace

slot.name: description
slot.value: Check for the available space on the archive disk

slot.name: name
slot.value: Check disk space

slot.name: recommendedAction
slot.value: Check the number of Upgrade Packages and Backups on disk as well as the Log size. Remove unused packages. Export and remove backups. Export logs to before they are truncated by the system. Follow the instructions for the 'Archive Disk Almost Full' alarm 0.
